item.title: Why do swing states matter so much?(Or some other political title)
item.description: Non-Technical executive summary A little bit about the purpose of this survey, and Introduction This is the part where we should write why we’re doing this. Which riding/province we’re focusing on and why them. Survey methodology In this part we can talk about how we’ve set our survey up. We should probably make references to the readings here(p.13 of Wu & Thompson reading). Inlcude a link for people to see what questions we’re asked.
